newsitem.title: USA: Banyan Strategic buys Atlanta complex.
newsitem.headline: Banyan Strategic buys Atlanta complex.

text.p: Banyan Strategic Realty Trust said Tuesday it acquired, effective January 15, the Phoenix Business Park in Atlanta in a deal worth $5.6 million.

Banyan said the property contains three multi-tenant, single-story buildings with about 110,600 square feet of rentable space. The buildings serve as offices and distribution facilities for 13 tenants and are 100-percent leased, the company said.
Banyan is a real estate investment trust.
Its shares closed fown 1/32 Tuesday at 4-1/4.
